content: There were three 9-point territories: one, in the center of the board, surrounded by 12 white stones; another, on the right side, surrounded by 9 black stones; and another, in the upper left corner, surrounded by 6 black stones.
translations: ita:C'erano tre territori da 9 puntiï¹• uno, al centro del tavolo, circondato da 12 pietre bianche; un altro, sul lato destro,
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
